page.title: 10LOCAL AMENITIES - Parks
page.content: BURE PARK, GT. YARMOUTH Bure Park is approximately 60 acres. In the early 1980's there was talk of turning the site into a camping area,but on 1.4.83 the pitch and putt course was opened. The course then had 12 holes, but was extended to 18 holes in 1985. A picnic area was constructed to the south. "Me & Hannah (sic) often visit the Park because it's close to my house. We take dogs there because there's loads of room for them to run. We usually stay for about 2 hours. I think Bure Park is amusing and fun because there is loads of things to do, and lots of space to play in without notices telling us NOT to do things. Afterwards we go down to the Amusements."
